p: In this study, we investigated the phenolic acids content in different phenological stages of H. persicum. According to the obtained results, there were 8, 9, 9, 10, ,8 and 7 different phenolic compounds at the vegetative stages, floral budding stage, full flowering stage, early development of seeds stage, mid‐mature seeds stage and, final stage or late‐mature/ripe seeds stage, respectively (Table 2).
